description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Micro Invasion is a shooter type game where you struggle to fend off waves of microscopic robot spiders injected into your brain to erase your memories and human instincts in order to turn humans into robotic slaves.1 player game with 10 player online score exchange.
description.short: Micro Invasion is a shooter type game where you struggle to fend off waves of microscopic robot spiders injected into your brain to erase your memories and human instincts in order to turn humans into robotic slaves.1 player game with 10 player online score exchange.
